name: Exp10sion
description: Dive into a whimsical journey with various levels in the cycle of explosions and rebirth. "Exp10sion", a pixel-style 2D platformer born in Ludum Dare 51, will tickle your puzzle-solving fancy!

name: Scourge of the Village
description: "Scourge Of The Village"is a Chinese folklore horror-themed text decryption game. An ordinary intern reporter, Chen Xi, is investigating a news event about factory sewage discharge, but she somehow fell into the torment of nightmares.

name: Veronikka's To-Do
description:
You cannot go back, there is no way to ignore it, no matter how difficult and gross it is…. If it is written in the To-Do, it must be done. Because that's why you created the list, to do your daily chores, such as watering the plants or going to pay your debts!

Interact with the inhabitants of "That Place", live a day in the life of a 16-year-old girl while she completes her chores, has fun with her friends and goes to the mall!

You can just do the chores and rest, or meanwhile discover what is Esther hiding in her basement!

name: Rocket Frog
description: In this challenging precision platformer, a bubble gum chewing frog bites off a bit more difficulty than he bargained for.

name: 3D Watermelon Game
description: Match fruit and get the high-score in this 3D Watermelon matching game! Try out 3 unqiue game modes and make your PERFECT smoothie!

name: Tsuki no Namida
description:
Winner of the Enterbrain Contest Park Web 2007 Autumn Edition Gold Prize.

Set in a world of silver, the protagonist, the kind-hearted prince "Kate," embarks on a journey from the castle to uncover the secrets of his birth. Rather than traditional RPG level-ups, character enhancement is achieved through equipment called "Talismans," into which gemstones are fitted.

In addition to the fire magic initially learned by the protagonist, it's possible to learn up to four different magics. Magic can be utilized not only in battles but also in locations marked with a "?" in towns and dungeons.

The game offers replay value with features such as Talisman crafting, combining magic to create higher-level spells, defeating monsters for "Monster Information," and striving to complete it. The graphics and characters exude a warm and gentle atmosphere, creating an emotionally impactful experience, despite lacking flashy and innovative elements.

name: Thunderbolts and Lightning!
description: Thematically open to interpretation, the jam had just one rule: maps must include a Thunderbolt (aka Lightning Gun)! This speedmapping event also includes some new mini powerups! A mini-pentagram, mini-quad-damage, and mini-bio-suit, each of which last only 8 seconds!

name: Ontranto
description: Five map episode set in a medieval fantasy world, with many custom textures, a few new monsters and some other QC: starting in a dark swamp, the player has to travel through caverns and temples to a ship bringing him to the town of Ontranto, where he is to battle the Duke.

name: Swamp & Towne
description: A medium sized, dark and hostile swamp, and a large medieval town with a few custom textures. The second map centers on the cult of Koth.

name: Eroge Academy
description: Sin descripción

name: Cute Ice!
description: Cute Ice! is a single map for Doom 2 that features a frigid, icy landscape which utilizes Jumpwad's textures. It is kinda slaughter-ish but is balanced for all difficulties for every player to appreciate the map, Ultra-Violence as always is the difficulty for players who seek a bigger challenge in this map.

name: NTR Dream
description: A steamy story about an affair going too far.

name: Qi Shen Nong Gui
description: Deception is a female-oriented pixel rpg game set in a hollow female background. In the game, you will play the role of Zhen Wu Si's Tie Rider to move freely in the Jianghu and the imperial court. The sea of bureaucracy is full of changes. The fate of the world is yours to decide.

name: Akai Onna
description: Akai Onna is a psychological J-horror game featuring a student.

name: Home Domes
description: Explore this life sim on a new planet. Create your new home on the rugged surface of Mars during the early days of colonization inside the safety of your new Dome. Everyday life on a new planet has new challenges and more difficulties of surviving out on the Domestead.

name: Case Guardians
description: Case Guardians, a thrilling multiplayer co-op experience that puts you in the heart of the action! In this fast-paced game, you and your friends embark on an exciting mission to protect a precious briefcase from waves of enemies cleverly crafted from everyday items!

name: Deltarune 97
description: Deltarune 97 is a Hong Kong 97 spoof game developed by Late Night Tom based on the video game Deltarune. The game is a recreation of the video Deltarune 97 by Xploshi.

name: Extreme Custom Night
description: You have finished your job of a night-guard last week, and now you have nightmares of your own. The memories are still awake in your head, and to stop the terror, you must survive against all of them!

name: Xtract
description:
Embark on a treasure hunt in the Xtract shooter full of puzzles, PvE as well as PvP missions, treasure hunting, and much more!

The lost civilization has left rare artifacts and untold treasures on a mysterious island. Find them, outsmart your rivals and get all the loot!

Assemble your team, fight enemies and other adventurers! Get new weapons and supplies, customize equipment and use all the capabilities of modern technology and the power of mystical artifacts!

name: Coloring Pixels: Medieval Pack
description:
This Medieval-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Experience Romanticised European History at its finest with this book!

From Knights and Armour to the peasants in the fields, this book covers it all.

name: Coloring Pixels: Fun and Games Pack
description:
This Fun and Games-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of toys, games and activities that are fun for all ages!

Rediscover your childhood joy with this book!

name: Honey Magician
description: Have you ever been attracted to a sexy, mysterious beauty magician? This game will let you enjoy and participate in the beautiful magician's performance.

name: Guàishòu
description: Survive a derelict city overgrown by jungle and filled with grotesques mutants lurking in the dark. Use your lighting gun to see it through.

name: Barbarians & Beasts
description: Choose your barbarian character to hack and slash many beasts. Swords and magic will fight alongside you against the beasts to free the kingdom.

name: Master Manager
description: You are the manager of a football club, determine its future by making the best decisions regarding tactics, training, player contracts, sponsorship deals and infrastructure. Watch your players performing on our amazing 2d match engine.

name: Dodo
description: Dodo is a tricky puzzle game where you have to enter the correct word to get to the next level. The letters you enter will change the grid on the screen - and you must get that grid to match the symbols!

name: UFO: Henfield
description: A point and click puzzle adventure game set across multiple time periods. Discover and enjoy this strange and surreal story about a mysterious letter, a missing professor and a confusing mansion. With more than a hundred items, locations and objects to investigate, can you solve the mystery?

name: Tr4pp3d
description: A 2D-puzzle game with sokoban elements. Your every step breaks the ground beneath, so choose your path carefully!

name: Quizz
description: Call your friend and start engaging in a simple and cozy experience while discovering all the questions that wait for you. Quizz is a game for everyone, having multiple question domains I am sure that some will fit you. Test your knowledge and luck to be the number one in the lobby.

name: Weapon Party
description: Weapon Party is a game that combines traditional Battle Royale with RPG, MOBA. Inspired by Vietnam.

name: Daldzah
description: Daldzah is an adventure inspired by the Nart Sagas, following the journey of a child and a deceased deity to the top of a mountain. Warm your surroundings, burn obstacles in your path, and help the North Caucasian deities on your way to reunite child with his parents.

name: Behind the Beyond: Ulti
description: A card game of wit and strategy. Can you defeat the best players and become the ULTImate Champion in the Kingdom Behind the Beyond?

name: Tretis
description: Tretis is the post-apocalyptic version of an arcade machine: immerse yourself in an adventure with subversive mechanics of extra-squeezed puzzle-action where you embody the cursor of an enigmatic game in a broken and harsh world.

name: A Void Shaper
description: Shape the void with the power of your cursor! A Void Shaper is an arcade game about avoiding shapes and killing them, while you collect upgrades. Unlock new enemy shapes and upgrades as you progress through the game and complete your collection.

name: One Fine Tourney
description: One Fine Tourney is a casual, single-player archery-puzzle game with over 40 handcrafted target challenges. Join 5 unique protagonists as they compete their way through a wild, unpredictable, medieval-style world and encounter everything from mythical creatures to chill concerts in the woods.

name: Mothman
description: A 1-4 player CO-OP horror game, a nightmare from hell, it is your objective to hunt down a sinister demon known as Mothman. Underequipped you must search the landscape for resources. Lay bear traps, stalk from a distance, and stay quiet. You came to hunt, only to be hunted.

name: Outlands
description: Build, Upgrade, Reset, Repeat

name: Lab 83
description: A 2.5D person puzzle game with creative puzzle solving. Use different blocks from what are available on each level to overcome to the obstacles. Complete levels quickly or with few blocks to get achievements!

name: MundusHex
description: MundusHex is a 3D logic adventure game, transporting players into a world filled with puzzles and mysteries. Explore, combine items, and converse with characters to unravel a captivating story.

name: Lanternia
description: Lanternia is a survival RTS with roguelite and deckbuilding elements. Build, defend, and expand the village in a dark wood, illuminated only with lanterns.

name: Hungry Jungle
description: A 2D survival adventure game. You come to the jungle alone, collect water and real objects, make survival tools to survive, face various beasts, and resist various harsh weather.

name: Zomcats Invasion
description: Zomcats Invasion, completely remade with better graphics, animations and smoother gameplay! Play with up to 10 friends online and fight endless hordes of Zomcats! Choose between a variety of maps, difficulties and weapons. Unlock abilities and find cosmetics that fit your style!

name: Soul Warden
description: Soul Warden is a deep dungeon-crawling RPG that combines classic roguelike gameplay with a pinch of collect-a-thon progression, plenty of humor, tons of loot, and a build-your-own-dungeon sandbox!

name: Hedenite
description: Hedenite is a hand-painted journey through a scruffy yet cozy, retrofuturistic world. Meet whimsical characters, unravel bureaucratic mazes, test your wits, and hone your observation skills in a game that mixes classic adventure with visual novel-style storytelling.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail x Wacca Collaboration Pack
description: The DLC includes a total of 8 songs, 3 gear skin, 1 notes skin, 9 emoticon, and 1 original theme.

name: Lisa Total Investigation!
description: Lisa Total Investigation is an adult game about corruption. Play as the future husband of Lisa, who was forced into an investigation by a mysterious Scotland Yard officer. How far will you push your fiancée to successfully complete this investigation? Beware of your most perverse desire!

name: Futanari College: Episode 1
description: Futanari College is an adult Visual Novel in witch you take control of an 20 year old guy whose life is turned up side down when he went to college where only futa-girls study. Will he be fun for the girls or will he find true love?

name: Dionysos Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Hands of Timber
description: Hands of Timber portrays the journey of a little wooden doll that wakes up inside the mind of its creator. To find her father, she must wander through his memories... the good, the bad, and the incomplete ones...

name: Model Human
description: Dive into Model Human, where platforming meets programming. Solve puzzles, learn coding basics, and guide protagonists to freedom in a visually striking world. Are you ready for this innovative gaming experience?

name: True Reporter: Mystery of Mistwood
description: A free detective "Hidden object" game. Solve the crime now!

name: WarShip
description: Drive a warship to attack the enemy ships, and finally kill the boss of this level to win.

name: Astral Druids
description: Be ready to protect the astral plane and survive the relentless monsters lust! Using the druids powers you'll be able to defeat every oponent, or make them kneel for you. Do you have what it takes to conquer them?

name: Fire Emblem Engage Bundle
description: The Fire Emblem Engage Bundle includes both the base game and its expansion pass.

name: Deepspace
description:
DEEPSPACE is an innovative Web3 strategy exploration MMO set in an expansive space environment. It integrates a sophisticated economy system using DPS, its native in-game token, along with NFT-based assets, providing players with genuine ownership of their in-game assets. The game is structured into multiple distinct stages, each offering a unique gaming experience, with The Hangar serving as the gateway to the vast DEEPSPACE universe.

Players in DEEPSPACE embark on a journey of purchasing, trading, and upgrading spaceships, fostering a dynamic interstellar experience. The game places a strong emphasis on exploration, inviting players to uncover the mysteries of genesis planets and various other aspects of its rich universe. The gameplay is diverse, ranging from resource mining to engaging in tactical battles against AI opponents and fellow players. Key features include strategic turn-based combat, the formation of alliances, and the expansion of territorial influence.

Operating on both the Ethereum and BNB Chain, DEEPSPACE adopts a gamefi model, blending gaming with decentralized finance. This model enhances the gameplay experience by offering economic incentives. The DEEPSPACE multiverse is a carefully crafted blend of exploration, resource gathering, and combat, ensuring an engaging and multifaceted experience for players.

name: Silver Falls: White Inside Its Umbra
description: The final game released for the Wii U, the game follows of a citizen of Silver Falls as they explore a dark forest in the outskirts of the town. While the Wii remote controls the character's flashlight, the GamePad acts as a pseudo-smartphone, allowing the player to control other elements.

name: Farm Keeper
description: Repeatedly bounce the falling peaches off of the monkey's back and get them to the other side of the screen.

name: Armored Fox
description: A first-person tank game.

name: Aqua-Mix
description: A Puyo Puyo-like puzzle game; uses sound effects from Puzzle Bobble.

name: Circus of TimTim
description: Circus of TimTim is a Stealth Horror Survival Game about two siblings trying to sneak inside the most hunted carnival of all time to recover lost items with a metal detector device, however enemies are roaming around and they can hear your every step! TimTim is not happy ..

name: Battle Queen: Saikyou Fighters Retsuden
description:
Battle Queen is all about fights between beautiful young women. In the beginning of the game the player is given the option to choose one of the three available fighters. Each one has an introduction story. Sayaka witnesses the murder of her father, a circus acrobat, by a witch known as Lavender; her story begins with a fight against her. Mai's and Mercedes' stories are one and the same; they are fighting for dominance in modern-day Japan, and fight each other in the first round of their stories.

Despite looking like a fighting game, Battle Queen is strategy-, not action-oriented. The fights are turn-based. The player can choose between different moves, including four kinds of attack, jump, defend, special attacks, etc. Special attacks can only be executed after performing a sufficient amount of other moves.

Each move is displayed as an anime-style image. The girls lose parts of their clothes when being hit. Defeating the opponent results in a sex scene.

name: Tenkousei
description: Sin descripción

name: Lofty Form
description: Yakushiji Shion is the eldest son from the clan that punishes bad people. But after he assassinated Empire's shadow Kurobe Akiyoushi, it is regarded as a rebellion against the Empire. He gathers the clan and moves towards the North. Every day they are attacked by pursuers. At the same time he is chased by the girl Hiramatsu Yae who fell in love with Shion.

name: Lag
description: Our guy's father want him to find a girlfriend within 3 years. To start him off, his father build a new school and fill it with strong people, plus sealing off his fighting skills so he has to start new. Since our guy has been training all his life, he doesn't show much emotion. Can you help him get one of 4 girls within 3 years?

name: Takamisawa Kyousuke Nekketsu!! Kyouiku Kenshuu
description:
Kyōsuke Takamizawa is a twenty-three year old man who has been having some trouble finding a job. His last teaching experience wasn't particularly successful, and now he is out for better opportunities in the city. However, his real focus is on his charming female acquaintances - from high-school students to waitresses, neighbors, and other women populating the city.

Takamizawa Kyōsuke Nekketsu!! Kyōiku Kenshū is a Japanese-style adventure that focuses on getting acquainted with and gradually conquering various female characters. The player is presented with a map of two districts, each with a dozen locations that can be freely visited. The interaction in the locations themselves is sparse, consisting of a few context-related choices.

The game has an internal clock; each visit takes away at least twenty minutes of game time. Certain locations are accessible only during specific times. The main challenge lies in being in the right place at the right time in order to meet a specific character. A help screen shows habits and approximate schedules of the many female characters in the game.

name: Dreamhaven
description: Unlock the doors to your wildest dreams with Dreamhaven! Designed by an extraordinary team of junior developers aged 8-14, players will travel, through the imaginations and dreams of the next generation. Interact with AI power npc's that can create open ended conversations.

name: Anxious: Yuukyuu no Memory
description: Near future. Technology advances have allowed to create a perfect artificial lover indistinguishable from real women. Main character gets a job to test four such robots every day. He understands those are robots, but can't help having feelings for them.

name: Ko Ko Ro...
description: Kuonji Souji seems to have it all going for him. He is handsome, popular and excels at his club activities. His past is another thing altogether -- as a boy, he was raped repeatedly by his foster parents. The years have passed, and he has tried to forget by repressing those memories. They are still there, though, and come to him as hallucinations. Who is the raven-haired beauty he keeps seeing in those visions? Does she hold the key to unlock his past?

name: Rolus in the Outskirts
description:
Living out of a shed in the middle of nowhere, Rolus is always down on his luck. Today his tummy rumbles, but without a cent to his name, he's got to find a way to eat.
Luckily for him, there's a fast-food restaurant right down the street.
He finds himself dumpster diving, looking for any scraps, when suddenly a meteorite comes down from above—crashing into both him and the dumpster!

name: History of Meme Essence
description: Hardcore platformer, challenging gameplay. The game tells the story of the Meme Essence, which was awakened after Bebe the Ram seized power in the kingdom.

name: Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal
description: A new version of Hitman: Blood Money. Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal stars Agent 47, an assassin dispatching targets all around the world. The new version introduces some new mechanics, such as instinct mode and a minimap.

name: Elite of Conquerors
description: An independent MMORPG, created by the company "EC Games Studio," Elite of Conquerors is a multiplayer adventure game set in a fantastical world.

name: Death Mall 3000
description: A freeware game distributed in the late 80s via Macintosh's HyperCard system. It is a point-and-click adventure game where, after spending time in cryostasis a lone astronaut crash lands on earth. Seeking shelter in an abandoned mall the player must find a way out and figure out what happened to the Earth.

name: Baca
description: In this Columns clone, you must stack bricks to form lines which will fade as you progress. The difficulty increases as you progress.

name: Friday Night Wumpin' vs. Crash
description: Woah, what weird experiment did Cortex do this time ? Crash has yet again found himself on N.Sanity Beach, but this time, there's two unfamiliar faces that greet him !

name: Super Mario World Redone: Luigi Version
description:
Super Mario World Redone is a hack that aims to create much nicer visuals for the original Super Mario World, while adding some new features, secrets and an all new encore mode!
The game also includes new custom music and lots of bugfixes for the original game.

As a bonus, there are four new levels for you to find, and they are very well hidden! Can you find them?

And in this version you spend the entire game with Luigi!

name: Fix It
description:
Fix It is a puzzle game where the player assembles various machines out of a kit of spare parts. The machines are similar to Rube Goldberg devices and involve releasing a bolt from a wrench and then have it reach a box. For each machine the player has access to a toolbox with a certain amount of components of various kinds that have to be placed on the playing field to complete the machine. Most common are the elbows (l-shaped pipes) which change the direction of the bolt and the converters which change the property of the bolt. The bolt can be small and hollow, large and hollow, small and solid or large and solid and these properties have to match with the properties of the box and the parts. For example, to reflect a small and hollow bolt only an elbow with those properties will work. There is also the bouncer which rebounds the bolt in the opposite direction and the key which the bolt has to pass through to enter a locked box.

The game consists of 200 machines. The first 100 only uses regular parts while the latter 100 contains modified parts. These differ in that their properties change every time they are touched by the bolt. The parts can also rotated and change position. Machines can be built in any order even if previous ones have not been completed. Additionally there is an editor that allows the player to create new machines.

name: Zaxx
description: Finally on your Anstrad CPC a faithful adaptation of the famous coffee room game. Everything is there: homing missiles, anti-aircraft turrets, enemy fighters, laser barrier, saucers, etc ... Seven different tables follow one another, each table bringing you closer and closer to the ultimate battle against the robot of the fortress. Arcade games 100% machine language with remarkable graphics and animation.

name: TetrisMD
description: A Homebrew Tetris Game for the Sega Megadrive/Genesis, write with C and using SGDK.

name: Splatch!
description: Splatch! is a Boulder Dash clone originally released as a type-in program in the Amstrad Computer User magazine. You control a rabbit who must navigate underground levels to find carrots to eat. Digging through the dirt can release rocks which will fall and can crush the rabbit. There are other obstacles such as mushrooms and on later levels moving opponents which are deadly to encounter.

name: Fun Park ZX81
description:
20 Years on from the Spectrum game Amusement Park 4000, the Zeddy gets a conversion of the 16K Spectrum follow-up Fun Park for Chroma-enabled ZX81s. So much has been crammed into this game; amazing colour and graphics courtesy of Jarrod Bentley, more visitors and options. There are more rides than Amusement Park 4000, and AI and strategy is more sophisticated than the 16K Spectrum version of Fun Park.

You've never seen a ZX81 game that looks and plays like this.

name: Wilford Brimley Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Wilford Island
description: Adventure Island ROM Hack themed on diabetes advocate Wilford Brimley

name: Mesimes PT
description:
You go down an elevator to explore an abandoned underground research station. But something is wrong with those robots in there. Can you survive the horror that awaits you down there?

Mesimes PT is a horror survival game with original characters, location and story developed in the Blender Game Engine.

As main features, you can operate EMP turrets in the cameras. In addition, the game has detailed animations and a PS1 graphics style.

This is a passion project that has been in development for 2 years.

name: Payday 2: John Wick Weapon Pack
description:
A Professional’s Arsenal

Assassinating a target can be done in as many ways as imaginable, but when efficiency and precision is key the assassin need some tools of the trade. Guns, when used right, can yield the best desired results for the professional killer.

And this pack has one for every occasion...

The John Wick Weapon Pack comes with 4 New Weapons, 4 Masks, Materials, Patterns and of course plenty of Achievements.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Tears of the Kingdom Link
description: A mod which makes Link have his abilities from The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 6: The Den Patch
description: A whole new patch of the classic football videogame Pro Evolution Soccer 6, made by the Argentinian group: The Den

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Sun and Moon of Teyvat Pack
description:
A mod that adds 2 leaders from Genshin Impact, Klee & Nahida, alongside their respective civilizations, Mondstadt and Sumeru. Features:

- Unique districts (Favonius Stronghold & Akademiya)
- Unique units (Reconnaissance Company & Jumpy Dumpty)
- Unique city project (Fish Blasting Carnival)
- Unique WMD (Pounding Surprise)
- Features music from Genshin Impact
- And much more!

description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Neighbor Prototype
description: Fan Build and Playable Version of Hello Neighbor Prototype

description: Sin descripción

name: Betterified VI: Bestified
description: The sequel to Betterified V and the final game in the Betterified series. Sin Man assembles a team of four villains in an attempt to take down Mario or Toad.

name: SKD
description: Challenging action-adventure with stylish characters and sick combat (soulslike inspired) in a furry anime world.

name: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
description: A woman vanishes without a trace on a cross-country train. The catch? Nobody on board remembers her ever existing in the first place - nobody, except for you. Uncover the story in this detective ADV/visual novel!

name: Macro-TV
description: "MACRO-TV" is a 1996 Japanese sci-fi point-and-click game developed by the three-person studio MACRO-ARTS. Armed with the "MACRO-TV" system, players investigate the activities of hacker David Browith. Utilizing built-in CCD cameras and an ultra high-speed network, players navigate the dangers of cyberspace, unraveling the mysteries behind Browith's intrusion and his peculiar world.

name: Loe: Legend of Enomoto
description:
The protagonist received an invitation to enter a contest to win a very rich man's inheritance. The contest consist of quizs and games. Other contestants will compete with him. He can either do it alone or with someone's help.

This game consists many different kinds of puzzles like Japanese phase puzzle, math puzzle, room escape puzzle, finding item puzzle, etc.

The player must solve all puzzles correctly in order to progress the story. For example, if you fail the first entry level word puzzle, you will immediately reach the bad end.

name: Koutei Heika ni Narou!
description: While our king was visiting his dying teacher, he found and released a girl sealed in a tree. It seems his teacher had sealed her because she came from the underworld. What he released was just her spirit. To get her body back, he has to find medals that his teacher gave to other kings. Well, he has four commanders to help him do that. He can also get some princesses too, if he want to.

name: Tails' Nightmare
description: Tails Nightmare is a Sonic the Hedgehog horror fangame made in Flash.

name: Pokémon: Too Many Types
description: Released as a rom-hack of Pokemon Emerald, Pokemon Too Many Types adds multiple types like Sus, Furry, Sharp,Magic, Gamer and more along with returning pokemon from future generations like Poplio. And whole new moves using the new types.

name: X-Com: From The Ashes
description: The campaign begins with the player having to defend the X-Com base from an assault of the Men in Black. Then you will need to assess the situation and learn how to use the new opportunities. Many aspects of game mechanics and balance have been changed, giving a fresh experience. However, the gameplay and visual design remain in the spirit of the classic 1994 game.

name: Jerry's Autowalking Adventure to Rescue His Cheese
description:
This hack is Green Jerry’s first finished and released Kaizo hack.

It features 7 levels, each one with their own theme, and has only 1 route, so there are no secret exits.

name: Airballs
description:
Your difficult task will be to deliver levels from wild rotating balls. To do this, you will be able to use your studded shoes...

A raster moves up and down behind the title screen.

The screen size of the game is larger than normal: CRTC R1 = 32 (instead of 40); CRTC R6 = 32 (instead of 25); (R1*R6 = 1024 versus 1000 for a so-called normal display)

Published as a bonus in Databox 8-9-90 of PC Amstrad International magazine.

name: Mr. Capital!
description: Mr. Capital! needs all the coins! Every single coin! But there's a problem: he's gotta lug 'em all around... Mr. Capital should buy some pockets! Until then, make your way through the levels and collect all those coins! Will Mr. Capital learn the secret of success? Play and find out!

name: Head Trauma
description: Head Trauma is a 6-level map miniwad (5 + ending) in Doom 2 - Boom format.These are somewhat cramped and slightly hard, each one loosely inspired by one of the five senses, with some homages to classic megawads like The Plutonia Experiment, TNT, and Going Down.

name: Joust
description: The Atari 5200 and Atari 8-bit port of Joust.

name: Summer Heat
description:
Summer Heat is a romantic visual novel with heavy emphasis on choices. Some choices affect dialogue, while others impact the story in major ways. There are five main girls for you to romance, each with her own story branch, and even more side girls if you only want a casual fling.

The game has a smartphone. In future updates, we plan to fully flesh out the apps and make them really fun and exciting to use! The dating app Ember will be an especially big part of it, with Influencer-tier patrons being able to vote on decisions regarding Ember's content.

Other features we plan to include in the game are animation and an interactive photography system.

name: Missile Defense
description: A clone of Missile Command for the Apple II.

name: Gladiator Manager
description:
Take charge of a ludus in ancient Rome, and build an unstoppable team of gladiators!

Gladiator manager allows you to control the career of your gladiators in detail, and to construct training facilities, as well as grand monuments! You will be opposed by rival gladiator schools, as well as upstart rebels lead by Spartacus himself!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Klein Moretti Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Fool civilization with its Leader Klein Moretti.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique unit (Marionettist)
- Unique districts (Church of the Fool & Sefirah Castle)
- Adds a unique system that changes how the eras pass in the match

name: Zero Tours
description:
This is a Game Boy Advance RPG from Media Rings Corporation, released on July 27th 2001. It is also known as Mugen Kinogyou Zero Tours.
The game features characters known as Kigurumians (キグルミアン) who like to dress up as different animals. You can battle monsters (known as Nuigurumin) in dungeons and register them. Using a link cable, you may exchange items and Nuigurumin data.

name: Missing Parts
description: Find the missing part of the image to complete the image. Funny game for kids to recognize the images.

name: Heartbeat Girlfriend
description: Holding hands with her in parallel time and space, a real VR love experience.

name: Worm Game
description: Worm Game is an intense escape mission from the vaults of worm hell, taking you on an increasingly difficult journey to sneak through the heavily guarded gates. Features infinite randomly generated levels, online leaderboards, speed run modes and racing against yourself or online with your friends.

name: Zakesta-Z
description: Zakesta-Z is the newest version of the shoot 'em up that challenges players to blast their way through a total of five stages, with a main shot that can be powered up 5 levels and an array of sub-weapons that can be powered up 3 levels. The game also includes a stage select feature that allows players to practice previously-cleared stages with infinite lives, as well as a sound test that unlocks upon clearing the game.

name: Zooplop
description:
Zooplop is a physics-based puzzle game where you drop animals from a mechanical claw. When two animals of the same kind touch they merge into bigger ones!

Plan your moves carefully and avoid dropping too many animals at once, or you might run out of space. The game goes on forever or until all animals fill up the screen. Zooplop is easy to play but hard to master. How big can you go? Can you reach the whale? Can you merge the whale?!

name: Plane Starship: Galactic Frontline

The player needs to play as a fleet commander, commanding the fleet to travel to a galaxy bathed in war, purifying the dangerous enemies entrenched in it, and saving your people from fire and water.

name: Zanzibart

name: The Iceman
description: The Iceman is an exciting and thrilling game that puts you in the shoes of a character who loves the cold and will stop at nothing to reach the fridge.

name: The Last 66 Days

Set in modern day America, spend your sophomore year in college investigating a series of mysterious kidnappings while balancing your finances, your love life, and your school work.

name: Defender
description:
Defender is a 1981 horizontally scrolling shooter video game developed by Williams Electronics for arcades. The game is set on either an unnamed planet or city (depending on platform) where the player must defeat waves of invading aliens while protecting astronauts. Development was led by Eugene Jarvis, a pinball programmer at Williams; Defender was Jarvis's first video game project and drew inspiration from Space Invaders and Asteroids. Defender was demonstrated in late 1980 and was released in March 1981. It was distributed in Japan by Taito.

Defender was one of the most important titles of the golden age of arcade video games, selling over 55,000 units to become the company's best-selling game and one of the highest-grossing arcade games ever. Praise among critics focused on the game's audio-visuals and gameplay. It is frequently listed as one of Jarvis's best contributions to the video game industry and one of the most difficult video games. Though not the first game to scroll horizontally, it created the genre of horizontal scrolling shoot 'em ups. It inspired the development of other games and was followed by sequels and many imitations.

Ports were developed for contemporary game systems, most of them by either Atari, Inc. or its software label for non-Atari platforms, Atarisoft. The 1982 Atari 2600 version was one of the best-selling games for the system and sold over 3 million cartridges.

source: Wikipedia

description: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier is a side-scrolling platformer. Yuko can jump and attack enemies with her Valis sword, which can be upgraded and used as a ranged weapon by collecting power-ups found in the stages. She can also find and use items that grant her powerful all-screen attacks or temporary invincibility. Each stage culminates with a boss battle, after which Yuko's hit points and attributes increase.

name: Mugen Senshi Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
description: The Famicom port follows the same basic story, but instead of a series of separate stages, all of Vecanti is now one big, interconnected world. The gameplay differs considerably from the other versions, being more akin to a side-scrolling action role-playing game. It is a more difficult game due to its larger maze-style levels with multiple paths, and a lack of a password or save feature.

It has the same story and basic genre as the original first game in the series; however, it is a different game with different locations, enemies, bosses and new cutscenes.

name: Mugen Senshi Valis: The Fantasm Soldier

name: Antony & Cleopatra: Case IV: The Murder of Marlon Brando
description:
The year is 2021. Neo-America is prospering under the stern yet wise direction of President for Life, Gaius Julius Ceasar. 330 million souls live, love, and laugh, all working tirelessly for the glory of the American people! But with light comes darkness. With prosperity comes misery. And with law comes crime. Heinous crimes! Shocking crimes! Cunning crimes! And sometimes, very rarely, crimes so devious, so shadowy, so slippery that only Neo-America's greatest detectives can hope to solve them.

For these crimes, the very worst of crimes, America has a special team. Two individuals, both alike in dignity, in fair DC, where we lay our scene. Their names: Antony and Cleopatra.

He's the Vice President.

She's the Queen of Egypt.

Together, they fight crime!

Note that this is a fully synchronous two-player game and requires two people and internet access to work. You cannot download this game and play it offline.

name: Bubble Bobble: Lost Cave
description:
The “Bubble Bobble: Lost Cave” Project aims to create a new experience for every lover of the classic Bubble Bobble arcade game, designed by Fukio “MTJ” Mitsuji and crew back in 1986.

The aim is to provide the original Bubble Bobble coin-op with a whole hundred of different levels. Gameplay-wise, the game is going to retain all the mechanics of the original, but Bubblun and Bobblun will have to face a 100 challenging new stages.

name: Heaven Studio

name: Miss Bubble II
description:
Miss Bubble II is an adult bootleg/hack of "Bubble Bobble". It features 100 single screen levels with photographic semi-nude images for backgrounds. The background changes every three levels.

The player takes on the role of one of two yellow and green colored mice. Armed only with the ability to blow bubbles and jump, the objective is to trap and kill all of your enemies within the bubbles to advance to the next stage. The bubbles can also be used as temporary platforms, to help the mice reach previously inaccessible areas of a level. If a player is touched by an enemy then the player dies.

Any trapped enemies who are not killed quickly enough will turn red and escape their bubble prison. These angry enemies are much faster than before, making them harder to kill. Enemies also become angry if players are taking too long to complete a level. Defeated enemies are turned into bonus fruit items that can be collected for points.

On many levels, special bubbles appear such as water filled bubbles appear. These can be burst by players to release their contents and destroy enemies. The water bubble releases a torrent of water that will quickly flow down the platforms to the bottom of the screen. Any enemies caught in the flow are killed.

Bubbles containing letters also appear. The aim is to collect the letters needed to spell the word along the side of the screen.

Once the player loses all of his lives the game is over. Upon continuing, all remaining enemies return to their un-angered forms.

name: Bubble Pong Pong
